body.p:
Covington April 25/65
Gov Bramlet
my respect &c

Sir I hearwith Send you my resignation a Justice of the peace of the Second destrict in Covington Ky my business is Such I have never attended to the business any Since I received my Commition from you my naim was used in my absence Contrary to my absence wish please except and direct our Sheriff to order an election in may next

Justice Peace
Kenton Co
Resignation of E. T. Clarkson
accepted
27th Apl/65
